en.name: Standard Pad Set - 6pcs
en.description: For those who enjoy sports, education, or entertainment. Includes 6 Pads with plenty of predefined activities and the ability to create your own for enhancing your activities.
features: Powerful RGB LEDs with 8 color options
Lift the Pods off the ground with our unique CatchPad adapters
Rechargeable Li-Ion battery with up to 8 hours of operation on a single charge
Bluetooth low energy (BLE) communication with immediate smartphone pairing and up to 40 meter device-to-pad range

tr.name: Standart Pad Seti - 6 Adet
tr.description: Spordan, eğitimden veya eğlenceden hoşlananlar için. Çok sayıda önceden tanımlanmış aktiviteye ve aktivitelerinizi geliştirmek için kendinizinkini yaratma yeteneğine sahip 6 Pad içerir.
features: 8 renk seçeneği ile güçlü RGB LED'ler
Tek bir şarjla 8 saate kadar çalışabilen şarj edilebilir Li-Ion pil
Anında akıllı telefon eşleştirme ve 40 metreye kadar cihazdan pad aralığına sahip Bluetooth düşük enerjili (BLE) iletişim

en.name: Pro Pad Set - 12pcs
en.description: For those who enjoy sports, education, or entertainment. Includes 12 Pads with plenty of predefined activities and the ability to create your own for enhancing your activities.
features: Powerful RGB LEDs with 8 color options
Lift the Pods off the ground with our unique CatchPad adapters
Rechargeable Li-Ion battery with up to 8 hours of operation on a single charge
Bluetooth low energy (BLE) communication with immediate smartphone pairing and up to 40 meter device-to-pad range

features: 8 renk seçeneği ile güçlü RGB LED'ler
